item.title: Joanne add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "How wrong is it for a woman to expect the man to build the world she wants, rather than to create it herself?" -- Anais Nin

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "People living deeply have no fear of death." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "The role of a writer is not to say what we can all say, but what we are unable to say." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Writers do not live one life, they live two. There is the living and then there is the writing. There is the second tasting, the delayed reaction." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Osho
item.description: "Each person comes into this world with a specific destiny--he has something to fulfill, some message has to be delivered, some work has to be completed. You are not here accidentally--you are here meaningfully. There is a purpose behind you. The whole intends to do something through you." -- Osho

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Osho
item.description: "Experience life in all possible ways -- good-bad, bitter-sweet, dark-light, summer-winter. Experience all the dualities. Don't be afraid of experience, because the more experience you have, the more mature you become." -- Osho

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Osho
item.description: "Nobody has the power to take two steps together; you can take only one step at a time." -- Osho

item.title: Joanne add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Joanne add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "Know the rules well, so you can break them effectively." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I have lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.' You must do the thing you think you cannot do." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "We are afraid to care too much, for fear that the other person does not care at all." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Do one thing every day that scares you." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "I think that somehow, we learn who we really are and then live with that decision." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "If you obey all of the rules, you miss all of the fun." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "You can’t change the music of your soul." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Joanne add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Only the phoenix rises and does not descend. And everything changes. And nothing is truly lost." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "You get what anybody gets - you get a lifetime." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Joanne add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "If everyone demanded peace instead of another television set, then there'd be peace." -- John Lennon

item.title: Joanne add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality." -- John Lennon

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Dawna Markova
item.description: "I will not live an unlived life. I will not live in fear Of falling or catching fire. I chose to inhabit my days, To allow my living to open me, To make me less afraid, More accessible; To loosen my heart, until it becomes a wing, a torch, a promise. I choose to risk my significance, to live so that which came to me as seed goes to the next as blossom, and that which came to me as blossom, goes on as fruit." -- Dawna Markova

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "Religion is about turning untested belief into unshakable truth through the power of institutions and the passage of time." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Carl Gustav Jung
item.description: "You are what you do, not what you say you'll do." -- Carl Gustav Jung

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Carl Gustav Jung
item.description: "One does not become enlightened by imagining figures of light, but by making the darkness conscious." -- Carl Gustav Jung

item.title: Joanne add a quote by C.G. Jung
item.description: "Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes." -- C.G. Jung

item.title: Joanne add a quote by Carl Gustav Jung
item.description: "People will do anything, no matter how absurd, to avoid facing their own souls." -- Carl Gustav Jung
